column43: Following the recent introduction of a new recruitment system, DEFRA are currently undertaking an exercise to review the methodology used for collecting and reporting contingent labour data. It is anticipated that the new methodology will provide a more accurate reflection of the contingent labour workforce. Once scoping is complete, users will be made aware of the methodological change and any impact on the data reported.

column43: AHDB is funded through a levy paid by farmers and others in the agricultural supply chain. No funding towards staffing or other running costs is received from the government.
